name: Rotolo Consultants, Inc.
description: Rotolo Consultants, Inc. (RCI) is a full-service landscape construction, maintenance, and design firm serving the Southeastern United States. RCI specializes in commercial landscaping, resort and casino properties, municipal and HOA landscape design, aquatic and hardscape installation, and disaster recovery services. The company employs in-house licensed landscape architects and certified horticulturists to ensure design integrity and project execution at scale.

itemOffered.name: Landscape Maintenance
itemOffered.description: Routine, seasonal, and comprehensive landscape maintenance services for commercial, resort, HOA, casino, and municipal properties.

itemOffered.name: Landscape Construction
itemOffered.description: Full-scope landscape construction including grading, drainage, turf, planting, and infrastructure coordination using a design-build approach.

itemOffered.name: Aquatics and Hardscape Construction
itemOffered.description: Custom pools, fountains, retaining walls, and hardscape features for high-traffic commercial, entertainment, and hospitality projects.

itemOffered.name: Landscape Design Services
itemOffered.description: In-house licensed landscape architects and horticulturists delivering end-to-end design services for large-scale public and private developments.

itemOffered.name: Disaster Relief Landscaping
itemOffered.description: Rapid-response cleanup, stabilization, and post-storm landscape recovery for municipal and private properties across the Southeast.
